content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (x=-16.0, y=-49.0) with a burner inserter at position (x=-17.5, y=-48.5) supplying coal.
- Furnace at position (x=-14.0, y=-49.0) with a burner inserter at position (x=-13.5, y=-47.5) supplying coal.
- Wooden chest at position (x=-13.5, y=-46.5) storing iron plates.
- Iron chest at position (x=-11.5, y=-44.5) storing iron plates.
- Multiple burner inserters and transport belts facilitating movement of iron plates between furnaces and chests.

### Electricity Generator at Position (x=-7.0, y=23.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position (x=-3.5, y=23.5)
- Boiler at position (x=-7.0, y=23.5)
- Offshore pump at position (x=-9.5, y=24.5)
- Connected pipes and small electric poles for fluid and electricity distribution.

### Science Production and Research Facility
Consists of:
- Lab at position (x=-9.5, y=-39.5) with automation science packs supplied.
- Burner inserters and transport belts facilitating supply of science packs to the lab.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when attempting to interact with non-existent entities
- Verify the existence of an entity at a specified position before attempting to interact with it. For example, ensure a lab exists at the intended position before supplying science packs.

### Errors when inserting items without sufficient inventory
- Check your inventory for the required items before attempting to insert them into another entity.
